com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.server.impl
Class SnowmanFlagImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.server.impl.SnowmanFlagImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DynamicEntity, SnowmanFlag, com.sun.sgs.app.ManagedObject, Serializable
public class SnowmanFlagImpl
extends Object
implements SnowmanFlag, Serializable

This class represents a team's flag. It can be on the map or be held by a snowman

Author:
Jeffrey Kesselman, Owen Kellett
See Also:

public void drop(float x,
                 float y)
